Important Ketogenic Diet Resources:

www.charliefoundation.org
www.ketonutrition.org

The goal of Potter Dietitian Consulting, LLC is not to convince you that the KD is going to cure any medical condition. The goal is to provide a medically sound program where patients can follow the KD correctly and discover for themselves if their life and health will be impacted in a positive way.

Ketogenic Diet research and articles:

  • Parkinson's disease, Charlie Foundation article
  • Ketogenic Diet in Neuromuscular and Neurodegenerative Diseases, Biomed Research International
  • The Ketogenic Diet as a Treatment Paradigm for Diverse Neurological Disorders, Frontiers in Pharmacology
